title: Fix 7 failing tests caused by Technician MOM 55→58
description:
CRITICAL: 7 tests fail due to balance-tuner's Technician MOM change (55→58) in round 1. Tests that need updated assertions:

1. calculator.test.ts — 'Technician pre-shift stats are below knee (unchanged)' — expects MOM=55, actual=58
2. calculator.test.ts — 'Technician post-shift has slight fatigue (sta 43 < threshold 44)' — cascading from MOM change
3. calculator.test.ts — 'Technician stats use correct fatigue' — MOM: 50*ff should be 58*ff (note: old test used MOM=50 from pre-S22)
4. calculator.test.ts — 'Technician stats at deeper fatigue' — MOM: 60*ff should be 63*ff (58+CEP.delta=5)
5. calculator.test.ts — 'resolves Pass 1 with correct directional outcome' — Charger may no longer win impact against Technician
6. calculator.test.ts — 'counter bonus in resolvePass scales with CTL' — impact delta sign flipped
7. match.test.ts — 'replays Charger vs Technician Passes 1-3 via match machine' — pass 1 impact direction wrong

Recalculate all expected values using Technician MOM=58, CTL=70, GRD=55, INIT=60, STA=55. For tests 5-7: the Charger vs Technician impact comparison has tightened — Technician's higher MOM (58 vs 55) means Charger's MOM advantage (75 vs 58) is reduced, potentially flipping directional assertions. You may need to change assertion direction or use closeTo() for tight margins.

Acceptance criteria: All 589 tests pass (582+7 fixed). Run `npx vitest run` to confirm.

title: Fix Technician weakness at Epic/Giga tiers
description: COMPLETED Round 1: Technician MOM 55→58. Win rates improved: bare +3.1pp (48.7%), epic +0.9pp (46.4%), giga +2.1pp (48.3%). All above 45% target. 7 test failures from this change need fixing by QA (BL-014).

title: Assess breakerGuardPenetration effectiveness
description:
Breaker vs Bulwark matchup was 24% in Round 4 analysis. breakerGuardPenetration is at 0.20 but may not be sufficient. Run `npx tsx src/tools/simulate.ts bare` and check the Breaker vs Bulwark matchup specifically. If Breaker vs Bulwark is still below 35%, try bumping breakerGuardPenetration to 0.25 or 0.30. This constant is NOT test-locked (safe to change in balance-config.ts). Run before/after sims. Also try to understand why Bulwark remains dominant at bare (~63%). Write findings to analysis/balance-tuner-round-2.md.

IMPORTANT: Do NOT change archetypes.ts this round — wait for QA to fix the 7 failing tests from BL-001 first. Only touch balance-config.ts.

title: Investigate Charger weakness at bare tier
description: BLOCKED: Wait until BL-014 (test fixes for Technician MOM change) is done before making more archetypes.ts changes. Charger bare win rate is ~36-38%. ALL Charger stats are test-locked — any change will break computed test values. This task should only start AFTER QA confirms 589/589 tests pass.

title: Test gear variant interactions with archetype matchups
description: COMPLETED Round 1: QA added 112 new tests (44→156 in gear-variants.test.ts). All variant tests pass. Coverage: 72 matchup tests, 26 degenerate strategy tests, 7 mixed variant tests, 3 mechanical tests, 3 stress tests.

title: Test softCap boundary behavior
description: Write 5-6 tests for softCap(knee=100, K=50) edge cases: 1) stat exactly at knee returns knee, 2) stat 1 above knee, 3) Bulwark GRD at giga rarity (65+13=78 base, but after gear can cross 100), 4) verify softCap formula: knee + excess*K/(excess+K), 5) stamina is NOT soft-capped (passes through unchanged). Add to calculator.test.ts. Only start AFTER BL-014 is complete (tests green).

title: Test stamina/fatigue boundary conditions
description: Write 5-6 tests for fatigue edge cases: 1) stamina at 0 (minimum fatigue factor), 2) stamina at max (factor=1.0), 3) guardFatigueFloor=0.5 interaction with 0 stamina, 4) fatigueFactor with maxStamina=0 (division safety), 5) stamina recovery in melee for unseated player. Add to calculator.test.ts or playtest.test.ts.

title: Polish rarity card styling
description: COMPLETED Round 1: Added per-tier colored hover glow, selected state glow, prefers-reduced-motion support.

title: Improve variant toggle button UX
description: COMPLETED Round 1: Added stance-colored active states (red=aggressive, gold=balanced, blue=defensive). Note: LoadoutScreen.tsx inline styles partially override CSS — deferred App.tsx change needed.

title: Review balance-config.ts for magic numbers
description: COMPLETED Round 1: All balance-tunable constants are centralized. 8 inline formula coefficients are structural (not balance levers). One stale comment in types.ts:178. See analysis/review-round-1.md.

title: Type safety audit of gear system
description: COMPLETED Round 1: Engine/UI separation verified, type safety confirmed, no 'any' casts. See analysis/review-round-1.md.

title: Full tier sweep — run sims at all 7 tiers and document
description: Run `npx tsx src/tools/simulate.ts` at all tiers: bare, uncommon, rare, epic, legendary, relic, giga. Document all 6 archetype win rates at each tier in a table. This creates the post-BL-001 baseline reference. No code changes — just data collection. Write results to analysis/balance-tuner-round-2.md.

title: Test breaker guard penetration mechanic
description: Write 3-5 tests verifying breaker guard penetration works correctly: 1) breaker vs non-breaker — breaker should see reduced opponent guard in impact calc, 2) non-breaker vs non-breaker — no guard reduction, 3) breakerGuardPenetration=0.20 means 20% of opponent effective guard is ignored, 4) penetration applies in both joust and melee phases. Add to calculator.test.ts or playtest.test.ts.

title: Polish combat result display
description: Improve the combat result screen visuals: 1) make win/loss state more visually dramatic (larger text, color emphasis), 2) style the score breakdown to be more readable, 3) add visual hierarchy to pass-by-pass results. Only edit src/App.css.

title: Review round 1 code changes for quality
description: Review the code changes made by other agents in round 1: 1) balance-tuner's Technician MOM change in archetypes.ts — verify it's clean, 2) QA's 112 new tests in gear-variants.test.ts — check test quality, no flaky patterns, proper assertions, 3) polish's CSS changes in App.css and index.css — check for accessibility, no !important abuse, no broken selectors. Write findings to analysis/review-round-2.md.

title: Remove inline styles from LoadoutScreen variant toggle
description: LoadoutScreen.tsx:199 has inline style={...} on variant-toggle buttons that overrides CSS stance token colors added in BL-008. Remove the inline style prop and the VARIANT_COLORS constant (lines 57-61). This is a deferred App.tsx-adjacent change flagged by polish agent in round 1. NOTE: This touches LoadoutScreen.tsx — coordinate with orchestrator for App.tsx-adjacent file access.
